alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 19 at 2:22PM PDT until September 21 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING FOR GUSTY NORTHERLY WINDS FOR INTERIOR NORTH BAY MOUNTAINS, RESULTING IN ELEVATED FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING FOR GUSTY NORTHERLY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR INTERIOR NORTH BAY MOUNTAINS... The National Weather Service in San Francisco has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty offshore winds and low humidity, which is in effect from Wednesday evening through Thursday morning. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 504 North Bay Interior Mountains. * TIMING...11 PM Wednesday through 11 AM Thursday. * WINDS...North 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 25-30 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Up to 66. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity can cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
